label: Honey Jar
description: Changes honey bottle to a jar of honey, and renames the item.

label: Hot Lava Bucket
description: Makes original lava bucket really, really hot.

label: Animated Campfire Items
description: Animates campfire and soul campfire items in the inventory and in a player's hand.

label: Restock Clock
description: Makes clocks show when villagers can restock their trades.

label: Better Sign Icons
description: Changes sign inventory icons to be more similar to the block.

label: Cracked Nether Bricks
description: Improves cracked nether bricks by adding a magma animation in cracks.

label: Obsidian Ender Chest
description: Removes green and replaces it with an obsidian-like texture.

label: No Nausea Overlay
description: Removes the green overlay from nausea when distortion effects is set to off.

label: Better Helmets
description: Makes your face more visible when wearing a helmet.

label: Eggless Slime
description: Removes the "egg" in the middle of slime blocks and mobs.

label: Eggless Honey Block
description: Removes the "egg" in the middle of honey blocks.

label: Flower Golem
description: Makes poppies bloom on the texture of the iron golem.

label: Fancy Llama Decor
description: Gives llamas fancier carpet patterns.

label: Purple End Portal Frame
description: Makes end portal frame purple instead of green.

label: Connected Smooth Stone
description: Connected smooth stone. No OptiFine required.

label: Living Dragon
description: Makes dragon egg more detailed and implements animation.

label: Animated Furnaces
description: Adds animation to furnace and small improvements for smoker and blast furnace.

label: Detailed Hearts
description: Improves hearts, armour points, attack indicator and makes ping icons more colourful.

label: Matching Gilded Blackstone
description: Improves top texture of gilded blackstone.

label: Soul Campfire
description: Replaces oak logs with warped logs and ash with soul soil.

label: Fixed Barrel
description: Makes lines on barrel compatibile with lines on spruce planks.

label: Nether Fungi
description: Adds more variants for nether fungi.

label: Nether Roots
description: Includes variations for crimson roots and warped roots.

label: Anvil Sides
description: Adds damage texture on anvil sides.

label: Knowledge Book Fix
description: Corrects GUIs to use the new JAPPA knowledge book texture.

label: Emissive Ores
description: Makes ores glow in the dark. Requires OptiFine. By AbdulPlayz03

label: Target Score
description: Targets show their power level when hit with a projectile.

label: Arrowed Dispensers
description: Shows arrows on droppers and dispensers so you can differentiate them and know which way they are facing.

label: Shovels to Spoons
description: Renames shovels to spoons in-game.

label: Cleaner Maps
description: Changes the border of maps to be cleaner and less torn.

label: Daggers
description: Makes all swords shorter and renames them.

label: Tiny Meals
description: Changes food items models to be smaller, so it's not covering as much of the screen.

label: Shiny Clocks
description: Changes clock texture to fit more new textures style.

label: Warted
description: Changes wart crops, blocks and item textures to not be as ugly as before.

label: Variated Bricks
description: Makes bricks vary in colour.

label: Moobloom
description: Adds moobloom to game. Requires OptiFine.

label: Soul Lantern
description: Changes the regular sides of Soul Lantern to warped.
